faqData.title: What is a Binary Option?
faqData.desc: A binary option, also referred to as a digital option is an option in which payout is determined at the onset of the contract. It pays a fixed amount of cash if the option expires in-the-money, independent of themagnitude by which the price of the underlying asset moves. ExpertOption offers you up to 95% payout when the option expires in-the-money, and up to 50% return if the option expires out-of-the-money. The option cannot be sold before its expiration.

faqData.title: Do I need to download any software to my PC for trading?
faqData.desc: No, you don't need to download anything. All you need to do is to open an account on the website of ExpertOption.

faqData.title: Is there a demo account?
faqData.desc: We offer you to use a demo account with the balance of 10 000 virtual money in order to be able to evaluate the benefits of the trading platform.

faqData.title: How my profit is calculated?
faqData.desc: Your profit from a trade can be up to 95% of the investment amount. Profit depends on current situation of the market.

faqData.title: What is the minimum amount that I can invest?
faqData.desc: The minimum amount to invest in a single option is $1.

faqData.title: What is a minimum deposit amount?
Are there any commissions upon making transactions with my trading account?
faqData.desc: Our company does not take any commissions on your transactions. But such commissions can be taken by the payment systems or payment aggregator.

faqData.title: What is the minimum withdrawal amount?
How much time does it take to withdraw funds?
faqData.desc: Withdrawal requests are processed in 2 working days.

faqData.title: Do i need any documents to withdraw funds?
faqData.desc: Company representative can ask you to send scanned documents, depending on the withdraw type. All the information will be sent to your e-mail.

faqData.title: How can I close my account?
faqData.desc: In case you wish to stop using your account, please contact our Clients support department via email help@expertoption.com
